author: cms-sw
body: If a directory containing files with results of individual PR test steps is not available (e.g. has wrong permissions), the script will return a HTTP error (403 Access denied) instead of success (200 OK) and empty page. Returning an error _should_ cause cms-bot job to fail [link](https://github.com/cms-sw/cms-bot/blob/master/process_pr.py#L2062).
title: get_pr_results: fail if results dir is not accessible
